summary: An email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York requesting review of an attached warrant application, likely related to the Epstein investigation. The email shows coordination between prosecutors regarding legal documents.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email requesting review of a warrant application, working in the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Email regarding warrant application review
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney sends an email requesting review of an attached warrant application.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The email is dated August 8, 2019, shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's arrest in July 2019.
It shows an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York coordinating review of a warrant application.
The email indicates ongoing investigative or prosecutorial activity related to the Epstein case.
The attachment referenced (USVISW.v3.docx) appears to be a warrant application document.
The communication demonstrates inter-agency or intra-office coordination on legal matters in the case.
